Author: Iscariiot
Text: I like to think the critically underweight zone would be enough, but you’re probably right.   Still, internet isn’t concerned about this BMI so I feel invalidated. >:( Similarly I think I’ve forgotten how to eat without restricting. This is gonna be a mess to get out of huh?

Author: aeronJ73
Text: Typically we want to be sick because our problems don’t feel valid to ourselves or others, so we try to show just how sick we are. Try to remind yourself that if you drop that 7 pounds, next you’ll think “well now I’m just barely in the critically underweight zone, better lose just a few more” and it’s an endless cycle where you’ll just keep losing more. I hope you can seek recovery soon :)
